C

com.vcollaborate.validation.constraints - package com.vcollaborate.validation.constraints
This package contains classes which are imitating the constraints in javax.validation.constraints with some enhancements.
com.vcollaborate.validation.constraints.allowedvalues - package com.vcollaborate.validation.constraints.allowedvalues
This package contains classes to check for allowed values.
com.vcollaborate.validation.constraints.daterange - package com.vcollaborate.validation.constraints.daterange
This package contains classes to check for allowed date intervals between two dates.
com.vcollaborate.validation.constraints.nested - package com.vcollaborate.validation.constraints.nested
This package contains classes to validate embedded members or collections of it.
